card.name: Jorah, the High and Holy
card.text: Whenever Jorah, the High and Holy enters the battlefield or attacks, you get {V} (an influence counter). Creatures you don't control with power less than or equal to your influence can't attack or block.

card.name: Unholy Spirit
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If {W} was spent to cast Unholy Spirit, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each other creature card in all graveyards. If {B} was spent to cast Unholy Spirit, that creature assimilates all creatures cards in all graveyards.

card.name: Mangled Sanity
card.text: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player casts a spell, you may reveal a card from your hand that shares a type with that spell and cast it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Æthereal Elemental
card.text: Flash When Æthereal Elemental enters the battlefield, change the target of target spell that targets only a single creature to Æthereal Elemental. When Æthereal Elemental dies, draw two cards, then discards two cards.

card.name: Crippling Abnormality
card.text: Flying, menace When Crippling Abnormality enters the battlefield, target opponent controls you during your next turn. (That player sees all cards you could see and makes all decisions for you.)

card.name: Phylogelly
card.text: Haste {1{B}G}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a creature card with base power equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's base power, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: God's Ruinous Wake
card.text: God's Ruinous Wake deals 10 damage to each creature and each planeswalker. Lands you don't control don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.

card.name: Hallowed Lieutenant
card.text: Double strike Whenever Hallowed Lieutenant or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, create a colorless Equipment artifact token with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and equip {1}, then attach it to that creature.

card.name: Lumbering Ancient
card.text: Trample When Lumbering Ancient dies, put eight +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.

card.name: Ancient Gharial
card.text: Flash Ancient Gharial can't be countered. When Ancient Gharial enters the battlefield, scry 3. When Ancient Gharial leaves the battlefield, shuffle it into its owner's library.

card.name: The Good Book of God
card.text: {4}, {T}: Shuffle your library, then reveal the top card. If it's a nonland card with converted mana cost less than or equal to your influence, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, put it into your hand and you get {V} (an influence counter).

card.name: Cirno, Sly Arcanist
card.text: Any number of target players each draw a card. Cirno, Sly Arcanist deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in their hand. You get an emblem with "Whenever an opponent would draw a card outside of his or her draw step, instead you draw a card and this emblem deals 3 damage to that player."

card.name: U'ru, Grim Harvester
card.text: Up to one target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Up to one target creature you don't control gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Target opponent sacrifices a creature. Up to one target creature you control assimilates that card. You get an emblem with "Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, return that card to its owner's hand."

card.name: Vera, the Corrupted
card.text: Exile the top card of target player's library and up to one target card in that player's graveyard. Until end of turn, Vera, the Corrupted becomes a 4/4 Nightmare creature with indestructible and all abilities of creatures cards exiled with her that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to her this turn. Exile target creature.

card.name: Cunning Strategist
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you get {V} (an influence counter). Whenever Cunning Strategist attacks, you may have creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X until end of turn, where X is your influence.

card.name: High Priest of the Locus
card.text: When High Priest of the Locus enters the battlefield, suppress target nonland permanent an opponent controls until High Priest of the Locus leaves the battlefield. (A suppressed permanent loses all abilities and can't have or gain abilities.)

card.name: Bishop's Steed
card.text: Flying, vigilance Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0. Blocking creatures you control get +0/+1.

card.name: Ladria, Windwatcher
card.text: When Ladria, Windwatcher enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying. Whenever Ladria attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

card.name: Holtun-Band Emissary
card.text: While choosing targets as part of casting a spell or activating an ability, your opponents must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able. Whenever Holtun-Band Emissary becomes the target of a spell or ability, other Centaurs you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: The First Cleanse
card.text: You get {V} (an influence counter), then choose any number of creatures with total power less than or equal to your influence. Destroy the rest.

card.name: Absolute Scripture
card.text: Choose a card name. Until your next turn, your opponents can't cast spells with the chosen name or attack with creatures with the chosen name.

card.name: Grace of God
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, if you lost life this turn, put a blessing counter on Grace of God. If a source would deal damage to you for the first time each turn, prevent up to X of that damage, where X is the number of blessing counters on Grace of God.

card.name: Forgotten Journey
card.text: Exile all creatures. Return them to the battlefield under their owners' control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Locus Informant
card.text: Flash When Locus Informant enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand. You may have that player put all the cards in their hand on the bottom of their library in a random order, then draw that many cards.

card.name: Incandescent Drake
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, suppress target nonland permanent an opponent controls until your next turn. (A suppressed permanent loses all abilities and can't have or gain abilities.)

card.name: Souleater Hag
card.text: {U}, Return another creature you control to its owner's hand: Souleater Hag becomes a copy of that creature until end of turn.

card.name: Letholda, Manic Archivist
card.text: Hexproof You have no maximum hand size. At the beginning of your end step, draw a card if you have seven or more cards in hand.

card.name: Dubious Exorcism
card.text: Target creature's controller shuffles it into their library, then reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. The player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles the rest of the revealed cards into their library.

card.name: Transcend
card.text: The next spell you cast this turn costs {4}{U} to cast. Draw a card.

card.name: Mistranslate
card.text: Exile target creature or spell. Its controller may cast that card without paying its mana cost at the beginning of their next upkeep. Reprise {U} (As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may exile one card with reprise from your graveyard and pay its reprise cost. If you do, add its effects to that spell.)

card.name: Fated Path
card.text: Whenever you reprise onto an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {U}. If you do, create a 2/2 blue Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Soulstirrer Hag
card.text: {2}{U}: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1}. {2}{B}: Destroy another target creature unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Silt Basin Scorpion
card.text: When Silt Basin Scorpion enters the battlefield, it assimilates target creature an opponent controls. (Exile the assimilated card with its host. The host gains all abilities of the assimilated card as long as it's on the battlefield.)

card.name: Grisly Misanthrope
card.text: Menace Whenever Grisly Misanthrope deals combat damage to a player, remove a counter from that player and from up to one target permanent that player controls.

card.name: Skullseer Priest
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice another creature: You get {V} (an influence counter). {2}{B}{B}: Return target creature card with converted mana cost less than or equal to your influence from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Blarglou the Magnificent
card.text: Whenever an opponent loses life, that player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with converted mana cost less than or equal to the life that player lost. That player discards that card. Whenever an opponent discards a creature card, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie Orc creature token.

card.name: Slough Stalker
card.text: Whenever Slough Stalker or another Hag you control deals combat damage to an opponent, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Canker Purge
card.text: Destroy target creature whose power and toughness aren't equal.

card.name: Twisted Testament
card.text: You get {V} (an influence counter), then search your library for a card, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle your library. If its converted mana cost is less than or equal to your influence, you may reveal it and put it into your hand instead.

card.name: Bite the Dust
card.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. Up to one target permanent you control that shares a type with that card assimilates it. (Exile the assimilated card with its host. The host gains all abilities of the assimilated card as long as it's on the battlefield.)

card.name: Bloodstained Warcaller
card.text: Menace Whenever Bloodstained Warcaller deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 black and red Orc Berserker creature tokens with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to target opponent."

card.name: Stormcaster Mage
card.text: Flash When Stormcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard with converted mana cost 3 or less gains reprise {0} until end of turn. (As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may exile one card with reprise from your graveyard and pay its reprise cost. If you do, add its effects to that spell.) (As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may exile one card with reprise from your graveyard and pay its reprise cost. If you do, add its effects to that spell.)

card.name: Slaughterous Swine
card.text: Adaptive (Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only this creature, copy it.) Players can't gain life. Damage dealt by sources you control can't be prevented.

card.name: Conflagrant Clairvoyant
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard. Whenever you reprise onto an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Hadra, the Last Dragon
card.text: Flying Whenever a source you control deals damage to one or more creatures an opponent controls, put a +1/+1 counter on Hadra, the Last Dragon. Whenever a source you control deals damage to an opponent, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card for as long as you control Hadra.

card.name: Oathbreaker Orc
card.text: Oathbreaker Orc attacks each combat if able. Whenever Oathbreaker Orc attacks, it deals 2 damage to defending player unless that player sacrifices a permanent.

card.name: Temper Tantrum
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If that creature would deal damage to a permanent or player this turn, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead. If a source would deal damage to the creature this turn, it deals double that damage to the creature instead.

card.name: Thunderous Roar
card.text: Target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. Reprise—{1}{R}, Discard X cards. (As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may exile one card with reprise from your graveyard and pay its reprise cost. If you do, add its effects to that spell.)

card.name: Mind Meld
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with converted mana cost equal to that spell's. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Elder Stag
card.text: Trample Whenever Elder Stag deals combat damage to a player, add that much mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G} at the beginning of your next postcombat main phase.

card.name: Phytocreeper
card.text: When Phytocreeper enters the battlefield, it assimilates up to one creature card in your hand. (Exile the assimilated card with its host. The host gains all abilities of the assimilated card as long as it's on the battlefield.) Whenever a creature card is assimilated by a creature you control, you may draw a card.

card.name: Centauri Watchmen
card.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) If a spell or ability an opponent controls would cause you to discard a creature card, put that card onto the battlefield instead.

card.name: Greenglade Bugler
card.text: Play with the top card of your library revealed. {1}{G}, {T}: If the top card of your library is a land card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, another target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Jevara Wildborn
card.text: Beasts you control get +1/+1 and have trample. {2}{G}{G}{G}: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

card.name: Pack Partisan
card.text: Adaptive (Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only this creature, copy it.) Creature spells you control and spells you control that target one or more creatures you control can't be countered by spells or abilities.

card.name: Uproot
card.text: Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard, then for each permanent type, return up to one card of that type from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Hunter's Prowess
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards."

card.name: Reforestation Rite
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Greenglade Chevalier
card.text: Whenever Greenglade Chevalier or another Centaur enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {GW}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Crematory Wagon
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures crew Crematory Wagon, Crematory Wagon gains all abilities of those creatures until end of turn. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Web of Wonders
card.text: {3}, {T}: Activate an activated ability of target creature you control without paying its costs.

card.name: Hallowed Chapel
card.text: When Hallowed Chapel enters the battlefield, you get {V} (an influence counter). {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}: Draw a card, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library. Activate this ability only if your influence is 3 or greater.

card.name: Sunlit Stream
card.text: ({T}: Add {W} or {U}.) Sunlit Stream enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a colored permanent.

card.name: Grim Quagmire
card.text: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.) Grim Quagmire enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a colored permanent.

card.name: Scorched Ruins
card.text: ({T}: Add {B} or {R}.) Scorched Ruins enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a colored permanent.

card.name: Thriving Peaks
card.text: ({T}: Add {R} or {G}.) Thriving Peaks enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a colored permanent.

card.name: Cloistered Mill
card.text: ({T}: Add {G} or {W}.) Cloistered Mill enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a colored permanent.

card.name: Wakestone Gargoyle
card.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying {1}{W}: Creatures you control with defender can attack this turn as though they didn't have defender.

card.name: Cybres-Band Lancer
card.text: First strike Whenever Cybres-Band Lancer attacks, another target attacking Centaur you control gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Maiden of the Golden Graves
card.text: When Maiden of the Golden Graves enters the battlefield, you get {V} (an influence counter), then return up to one creature card with converted mana cost less than or equal to your influence from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Faithful Scribe
card.text: When Faithful Scribe enters the battlefield, you get {V} (an influence counter). Faithful Scribe gets +1/+1 as long as your influence is 3 or greater.

card.name: Apprentice Lancer
card.text: When Apprentice Lancer enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Centaur card from your hand. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Apprentice Lancer.

card.name: Hero of Hedria
card.text: Double strike

card.name: Sanguine Ritualist
card.text: Vigilance Whenever a creature attacks you, suppress it until end of turn. (A suppressed permanent loses all abilities and can't have or gain abilities.)

card.name: Blacktalon Griffin
card.text: Flying As long as Blacktalon Griffin is attacking, it gets +1/+0.

card.name: Message of Warfare
card.text: Create two 2/2 white Centaur Knight creature tokens with vigilance. If you attacked with a Page this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Visions of Peace
card.text: You get {V} (an influence counter), then Visions of Peace deals damage equal to your influence divided as you choose among any number of target attacking or blocking creatures.

card.name: Last Bastion
card.text: Choose one — • Create two 1/1 red and white Citizen creature tokens. • Create a 0/4 colorless Wall artifact creature token with defender.

card.name: Arbitrate
card.text: Exile target nonland permanent with one or fewer abilities. Its controller gains 4 life.

card.name: Sacrament of Penance
card.text: When Sacrament of Penance enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Sacrament of Penance leaves the battlefield. At the beginning of each upkeep, suppress all creatures that share a creature type with the exiled card. (A suppressed permanent loses all abilities and can't have or gain abilities.)

card.name: Crippling Warbler
card.text: Crippling Warbler can't be blocked unless defending player pays {2} for each creature blocking it. Sacrifice Crippling Warbler: Counter target spell or ability that targets you or a permanent you control unless that spell's controller pays {2}.

card.name: Ætherstewer
card.text: Whenever Ætherstewer or another Hag you control deals combat damage to a player, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Corrupted Seer
card.text: When Corrupted Seer enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other back on top of your library or into your graveyard.

card.name: Keeper of the Ancient Winds
card.text: Prowess When Keeper of the Ancient Winds enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card with reprise, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Empyrean Owl
card.text: Flying Whenever you reprise onto an instant or sorcery spell, Empyrean Owl gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Ghast of Councils Past
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes the target of a spell or ability, suppress that creature until end of turn. (A suppressed permanent loses all abilities and can't have or gain abilities.)

card.name: Scorner of the Meek
card.text: When Scorner of the Meek enters the battlefield, you may return target nonland permanent with one or fewer abilities to its owner's hand.

card.name: On Wondrous Winds
card.text: Exile target creature you control and target creature you don't control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owners' control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Message of Discovery
card.text: Draw two cards. If you attacked with a Page this turn, return up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Message of Discovery.

card.name: Chapel's Edict
card.text: You get {V} (an influence counter), then counter target spell unless its controller pays X, where X is your influence.

card.name: Unspoken Sermon
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, suppress up to one target nonland permanent that player controls until your next turn. (A suppressed permanent loses all abilities and can't have or gain abilities.)

card.name: Persuasive Distraction
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Reprise {3}{U} (As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may exile one card with reprise from your graveyard and pay its reprise cost. If you do, add its effects to that spell.)

card.name: Chronicle
card.text: Scry 3. Reprise {U} (As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may exile one card with reprise from your graveyard and pay its reprise cost. If you do, add its effects to that spell.)

card.name: Carrion Coyote
card.text: When Carrion Coyote enters the battlefield, it assimilates target creature card in your graveyard. (Exile the assimilated card with its host. The host gains all abilities of the assimilated card as long as it's on the battlefield.)

card.name: Locus Inquisitor
card.text: When Locus Inquisitor enters the battlefield, you get {V} (an influence counter), then another target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is your influence.

card.name: Festerleech
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life. When Festerleech dies, target creature an opponent controls assimilates it. (Exile the assimilated card with its host. The host gains all abilities of the assimilated card as long as it's on the battlefield.)

card.name: Nightwing Witch
card.text: Flying Nightwing Witch enters the battlefield tapped. When Nightwing Witch enters the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to the number of tapped Hags you control.

card.name: Skullcruncher
card.text: When Skullcruncher dies, you may exile it. If you do, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard, then return up to one creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Trisir Blood Priest
card.text: When Trisir Blood Priest enters the battlefield, you get {V} (an influence counter). Trisir Blood Priest has deathtouch as long as your influence is 3 or greater.

card.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Jorah's Devout
card.text: Whenever you get an influence counter, you may return Jorah's Devout from your graveyard to your hand.

card.text: Target player discards two cards. If you attacked with a Page this turn, that player loses 4 life.

card.text: Target non-Hag creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

card.name: Arcane Scholar
card.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever you reprise onto an instant or sorcery spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Hinterland Basilisk
card.text: Trample, deathtouch {1{B}G}{BG}: Target creature you control assimilates Hinterland Basilisk. Activate this ability only if Hinterland Basilisk is in your graveyard. (Exile the assimilated card with its host. The host gains all abilities of the assimilated card as long as it's on the battlefield.)

card.name: Dragonfire Ballista
card.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {1{R}W}, {T}: Dragonfire Ballista deals damage to target attacking creature equal to the number of creatures you control with defender.

card.name: Primal Amalgam
card.text: When Primal Amalgam enters the battlefield, choose one — • Another target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn. • Another target creature has base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.

card.name: His Majesty's Skyship
card.text: Flying Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Riverway Gondola
card.text: Riverway Gondola can't be blocked unless defending player pays {2} for each creature blocking it. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Trip Noose
card.text: {2}, {T}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Mortuary Shovel
card.text: {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mortuary Shovel: Target player shuffles up to three target cards from their graveyard into their library.

card.name: Entrenching Silt
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Suppress target nonbasic land until end of turn. (A suppressed permanent loses all abilities and can't have or gain abilities.)

card.name: Golden Raven Squire
card.text: When Golden Raven Squire enters the battlefield, you get {V} (an influence counter). As long as your influence is 3 or greater, Golden Raven Squire gets +0/+1 and has vigilance.

card.name: Keeper of the Sacred Oath
card.text: When Keeper of the Sacred Oath enters the battlefield, you get {V} (an influence counter). {W}, {T}: Tap target creature with power less than or equal to your influence.

card.text: You get {V} (an influence counter), then you gain life equal to twice your influence.

card.name: Comeuppance
card.text: Enchant creature When Comeuppance enters the battlefield, suppress enchanted creature until Comeuppance leaves the battlefield. (A suppressed permanent loses all abilities and can't have or gain abilities.) Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

card.text: Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.

card.text: Swift Retribution deals 3 damage to target attacking creature.

card.name: Hasty Sanctions
card.text: Tap target creature. Suppress it until your next turn. (A suppressed permanent loses all abilities and can't have or gain abilities.) Draw a card.

card.text: When Disciple of the Cloth enters the battlefield, you get {V} (an influence counter). As long as your influence is 3 or greater, Disciple of the Cloth gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.

card.text: {U}, {T}: Suppress target creature until end of turn. (A suppressed permanent loses all abilities and can't have or gain abilities.)

card.name: Cauldron Diviner
card.text: When Cauldron Diviner enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Prophecy Babbler
card.text: When Prophecy Babbler enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then put two cards from your hand on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Withered Visage
card.text: When Withered Visage enters the battlefield, target creature gets -4/-0 until your next turn.

card.name: Sleetscale Serpent
card.text: Flying When Sleetscale Serpent enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Shrewd Courier
card.text: Whenever Shrewd Courier deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.text: When Acolyte of the Golden Raven enters the battlefield, you get {V} (an influence counter). Acolyte of the Golden Raven has flying as long as your influence is 3 or greater.

card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player loses 1 life.

card.name: Greater Prey
card.text: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, another creature you control assimilates that card. (Exile the assimilated card with its host. The host gains all abilities of the assimilated card as long as it's on the battlefield.)

card.name: Maintain the Crypts
card.text: You get {V} (an influence counter). Target opponent discards a card, then you exile a number of cards from that player's graveyard equal to your influence.

card.name: Reclaimed Rot
card.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a land or creature card from among them into your hand, then up to one target creature assimilates a creature card from among them. Put the rest into your graveyard. (Exile the assimilated card with its host. The host gains all abilities of the assimilated card as long as it's on the battlefield.)
